name: A heavy granite ring
data: It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'spiritual link'.
It decreases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
